text: Skazhi im, o poslannik: "Yesli vy somnevayetes' v istinnosti islama, s kotorym ya poslan, to bud'te uvereny, ya nikogda ne budu poklonyat'sya tem idolam, kotorym vy poklonyayetes' pomimo Allakha. YA poklonyayus' tol'ko Allakhu, kotoromu vy prinadlezhite, kotoryy reshayet vashi sud'by i umershchvlyayet vas. On povelel mne byt' veruyushchim
